duration.$description: skeleton.animation.duration — Animation cycle duration (1.5s). Slow enough to be subtle, fast enough to indicate loading.

easing.$description: skeleton.animation.easing — Animation easing. Smooth ease for gentle pulsing effect.

circle.$description: skeleton.borderRadius.circle — Circle skeleton border radius (full). Use for: avatar placeholders, icon placeholders.

default.$description: skeleton.borderRadius.default — Default skeleton border radius (4px). General-purpose shape for rectangular content blocks.

text.$description: skeleton.borderRadius.text — Text skeleton border radius (4px). Slight rounding for text line placeholders.

avatar.$description: skeleton.height.avatar — Avatar skeleton height (40px). Matches medium avatar size for consistent placeholder.

heading.$description: skeleton.height.heading — Heading skeleton height (24px). Approximates a heading line.

text.$description: skeleton.height.text — Text line skeleton height (14px). Approximates a single line of body text.
